mentions.candidate: I’m a Walthamstow-born web developer, the father of two young children. A renter all my life, I share the concerns of many locals, and believe that the Green Party offers the bold joined-up thinking that we need in politics to tackle the root causes of the challenges we face.
mentions.tacticalSituation: GREENS ARE ON THE UP IN WALTHAMSTOW THIRD PARTY IN 2015: INCREASING OUR VOTE SHARE FROM 1.9% TO 6.4%.

leaflet.personalStatement: I’m a Walthamstow-born web developer, the father of two young children. A renter all my life, I share the concerns of many locals, and believe that the Green Party offers the bold joined-up thinking that we need in politics to tackle the root causes of the challenges we face.

images.caption: ANDREW JOHNS for a better future

leaflet.additionalNotes: LET'S KEEP THAT MOVEMENT GOING, STAND WITH US FOR A BOLDER, BRIGHTER, BIGGER FUTURE
